title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa das Trompas
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa das Trompas
description: Parking height 2.3m 350m from the cathedral. Shared parking with a hotel so seems safe. Flat with clean toilet. Another car park a little further down the street, with no height limits but not flat.

title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 6-2 Rúa de Ramón del Valle-Inclán

title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 4 Rúa da Angustia

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa das Hortas
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa das Hortas
description: Lovely laundry room with patio to kick back and relax while you do your laundry. It is right at the foot of Obradoiro square so you can wash and take a walk while in the old town

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 27 Rúa da Raxeira
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 27 Rúa da Raxeira

title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 2B Rúa da Fonte dos Concheiros
description: Clothes washing and drying machines, for a fee. When the photograph of the premises was taken, the work had not yet been done, but it exists. Automatic laundry. open from 10am to 10pm, nice decoration, very clean place

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa dos Pelamios
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa dos Pelamios
description: Shaded parking 5 minutes' walk from the cathedral, suitable for vans only

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 21 N-550
description: Laundry room with washing machine and dryer, when taken from the photo the place was not yet finished, but it exists. Automatic laundry. nice decoration, very clean place

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - s/n Rúa de Tras Santa Isabel
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - s/n Rúa de Tras Santa Isabel
description: Parking 5 minutes from the cathedral. Not many places but ideal for visiting Santiago de Compostela. Free parking located next to the municipal stadium. Night prohibited.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa das Fontes do Sar
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa das Fontes do Sar
description: Small parking lot next to a huge park, some municipal swimming pools, soccer field, paddle tennis courts and trail areas. Very close to Santiago de Compostela. Part of the parking lot is a bit inclined. We slept without any noise in the middle of August.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 9 Rúa dos Pelamios
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 9 Rúa dos Pelamios
description: Small parking space for motorhomes up to 5m in length located 850m from the cathedral.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Profesor Legaz Lagambra
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Profesor Legaz Lagambra
description: Parking in quiet blue area in summer, being a university area. Parking areas flat and covered with trees. 15 minutes walk from the cathedral.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 14 Rúa de Vista Alegre
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 14 Rúa de Vista Alegre
description: 800m from the cathedral..parking overlooking the park and the Auditorio de Galicia..no blue zone. shaded park with benches

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 17 Rúa do Luar do Carme

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela -
description: Impeccable to visit Santiago, a quarter of an hour walk from the cathedral. We did not stay overnight but it is possible.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 48 Rúa de Vista Alegre
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 48 Rúa de Vista Alegre
description: We spent one night here, it is a quiet place to park level and 10 minutes walk from the cathedral of Santiago. There is space for 5 . Down the street there are more parking spaces next to the park, but we found it noisier. Ideal to visit the city in one day.

title: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Burgo das Nacións
title_short: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Burgo das Nacións

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 45 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 45 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
description:
Launderette on the main road. Possible to park behind the house, spacious place, if you also use the launderette. It's private land.
Prices are normal.
payment via machine (choice of different languages).

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 22 Avenida de Romero Donallo
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 22 Avenida de Romero Donallo
description: Underground covered parking in Av. Romero Donallo. Height 2.20m. Ideal for Camper vans type California / Viano / ... to visit Santiago.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 21 Avenida de Castelao
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 21 Avenida de Castelao
description:
Small car park with 20 spaces, including large ones that can accommodate motorhomes.
No visible prohibition but I think it is not appropriate to spend the night there.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 2A Avenida de Novoa Santos
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 2A Avenida de Novoa Santos
description: Parking. 15 minutes walking distance to the cathedral.

title: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Avenida de Castelao
title_short: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Avenida de Castelao

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 6 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 6 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
description: Parking to visit the city. We have spent a night without problems. 18 minutes from the cathedral. In the university area.

address.street: 6 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 2B Rúa do Cruceiro da Coruña

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - Av. Manuel Fraga Iribarne
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - Av. Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: They allow parking during the day, until 23:00. Overnight stay is not allowed.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa Doutor Maceira
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa Doutor Maceira
description: Land parking next to a school. Only for vans. There are several buildings around and bars. No services. 20 min walk from the center.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa do Pintor Laxeiro
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa do Pintor Laxeiro
description: Hundreds of parking spaces 24 hours, next to the station and gas station. According to a local very safe. Maybe just for a very large motorhome. Quite full but many places. It is in the blue zone from 10-14 hours approximately 3. We spent the night without problem.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 78 Rúa da Canteira de Arriba
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 78 Rúa da Canteira de Arriba
description: Parking on the outskirts of the city, surrounded by a park with trees and shade, perfect for sleeping after visiting the city and resting before continuing the trip.

name: Camping As Cancelas (Santiago de Compostela)
title: (15703) Camping As Cancelas (Santiago de Compostela)
description: The campsite is well located for visiting Compostela and the Cathedral. On foot or by bus. The sanitary facilities are clean and well maintained. The steep driveway is not a problem as many write.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 15 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 15 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
description: Very quiet place next to the faculty, the adjoining streets have a blue zone (this one does not have it) there is a faculty guard who passes several times by car, he does not say anything, we have spent the night very quiet, he has a park right in front and a garden, a car passes from time to time, nothing annoying

address.street: 15 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
description: Free parking ideal for visiting the city of Santiago de Compostela. Very quiet, easy to find places unlike the area next door. We did not spend the night there but it seems possible if there is no prohibition sign about 1 km on foot from the cathedral.

address.street: Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa de Roberto Vidal Bolaño
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa de Roberto Vidal Bolaño
description: Parking 20 minutes walk from the cathedral, free, safe and quiet!  Nearby we recommend a restaurant to eat well and at good prices, 50 meters from the parking lot. Not recommended for campers over 6 meters.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 8 Rúa Manuel María
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 8 Rúa Manuel María
description:
Area guarded and paid parking. Possibility to stay overnight but not super quiet.
For the day at 20 minute walk from downtown, Ideal.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa do Doiro
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa do Doiro
description: Very large parking for buses and camper vans, only from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., municipal ban on sleeping in the car park. The exit barrier remains open after 8 p.m., 2 km from the center.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rua de Vicente Fraiz Andon
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rua de Vicente Fraiz Andon
description: Spacious parking next to the university. Probably meant for students but not prohibited for others in any way.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 70 AP-9
description: To visit monte viso, excursion suitable for children, views of all of Santiago from above

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa do Avío de Abaixo
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa do Avío de Abaixo

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Avenida de Fernando de Casas Novoa
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Avenida de Fernando de Casas Novoa

address.street: 36 Avenida de Fernando de Casas Novoa

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela Spain - 41 Lugar Puente Pereda
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela Spain - 41 Lugar Puente Pereda
description: This place is about 20 minutes away from the cathedral uneven but perfect for visiting Santiago de Compostela. We spent the night here and it was quiet. Lots of people were walking dogs here.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 39 Avenida do Mestre Mateo
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 39 Avenida do Mestre Mateo
description: Newly created street where you can park 24/7 for free. It is best to arrive before 7:30 a.m. or after 8:00 p.m., otherwise students will use it! For smaller rubbish there are rubbish bins all around. !!! This is curbside parking, neither straight nor quiet!!!

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 23 Rúa de Melide
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 23 Rúa de Melide
description: Automatic laundromat. Washing+drying. open from 10h to 22h, nice decor, very clean place

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa de Constantino Candeira
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa de Constantino Candeira
description: Gravel lot on the university campus. practically empty outside of the semester. A few cars came and went into the square at night, otherwise very quiet for a Friday evening.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Estrada de San Lourenzo
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Estrada de San Lourenzo
description: Quiet parking place, white area, we spent the night very quiet, 20 min walk from the cathedral. and back by taxi about 4 euros.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa de Federica Montseny
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa de Federica Montseny
description: Newly created residential area with free parking. It has a playground next to it and many litter bins. 2.5km to the center of Santiago. It is a way of not entering the center with the vehicle since there is hardly anywhere to put it or through which to pass. you can sleep peacefully

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa do Bidueiro
title_short: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa do Bidueiro
description: Free Parking along stretch of side road. Space for any size motorhome, 20 minute straight walk to the cathedral. Recommended!

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 81 Avenida de Ferrol
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 81 Avenida de Ferrol
description: Public car park without services, recently opened, ideal for visiting the city. Paid only during the day between 10:00 and 20:30. Free night. Surrounded by services, supermarkets, pharmacy, restaurants, bars, etc. Very easy to access.

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 93 Santo Ignacio do Monte
title_short: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 93 Santo Ignacio do Monte
description: Parking of the natural park overlooking Santiago. Very quiet, no insecurity, many hiking trails, children's playground, two water points, bins, less than 10min drive from the historic center. Breathtaking views of the Cathedral of Santiago de Compostela. We highly recommend.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa de Varela Montes
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa de Varela Montes
description: Parking next to the park, widely used by medium-sized motorhomes and vans, level, very close to the center, bus 20 meters away, restaurant and Vaquiña grill 30 meters away.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Rúa de Feliciano Barrera Fernández
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Rúa de Feliciano Barrera Fernández
description: Very large and guarded parking a few meters from the center, it has quite a slope but there is a lot of space

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 116 Camiño dos Vilares
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 116 Camiño dos Vilares
description: Quiet place to sleep with the camper without raising the roof. Free

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela -
description: Flat land, in the middle of the forest. Hiker parking lot

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida de San Lázaro
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida de San Lázaro
description: Free parking area well connected with nearby bus stops to visit Santiago. It is close to a commercial area (As Cancelas) and a bar area in that same street (San Lázaro). In addition, it is close to Monte do Gozo. We had a very quiet night.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa do Lavadoiro
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa do Lavadoiro
description: Place to stop to eat and take a walk around the city.

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - Estrada do Pedroso
title_short: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - Estrada do Pedroso
description: Picnic area in Monte Pedroso. It is quite flat and outside of meal times, when there may be more people, the site is very quiet and with plenty of shaded areas. There are many places in the area where you can park for the afternoon and overnight. Very close to Santiago de Compostela, ideal to visit.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 20 Rúa das Tabaniscas
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 20 Rúa das Tabaniscas
description: Parking near a junction between a station and a shop, we repaired for one night, 2km from the cathedral, a little passage at night.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 16 Rúa da Benéfica de Conxo
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 16 Rúa da Benéfica de Conxo
description:
Covered motorhome parking, free from rain. Closed warehouse of 1000m2, central, ideal for getting to know the city and with a good location. The only car park from which you can walk to the cathedral. Water and electricity connection included in the price. It is not allowed to display items outside the motorhome. We don't have showers. The purpose of the car park is to park to get to know the city, park for a few days to do the Camino de Santiago and sleep. We work only with reservation, and only by WhatsApp.

€16/1 day
€12/following
€70/week

Transfer service to Sarria and other places in Galicia. Consult

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 33 Rúa das Tabaniscas
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 33 Rúa das Tabaniscas
description: Clean laundry room with free wifi.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 5-7 Avenida de Syra Alonso
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 5-7 Avenida de Syra Alonso
description: Flat parking stabilized 3 km from the center of Saint-Jacques de Compostela and the cathedral. Parking specified in the world of camper December 2017. Located Syria Alonso street 100 m from a Lidl

title: (15898) Correxins - Estrada do Pedroso
description: Above Santiago de Compostela .. nice place with a view of the surrounding area ... not Santiago .. you have to drive about 1000 meters further .. Good access for campers but watch out. Navi wanted to guide me through narrow streets ..

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Monte Pedroso
description: View of Santiago de Compostela, from the antennas

title: (15820) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Costa de San Marcos
title_short: (15820) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Costa de San Marcos
description: Layover/parking on the side of the road next to Monte do Gozo, without any services. Some noise at night, but ideal for going to the O son do Camiño festival.

name: Autocamper Compostela S.L.
title: (15820) Autocamper Compostela S.L.
description:
PARKING WITH LARGE PLOTS AND IMPRESSIVE VIEWS OF SANTIAGO. BUS STOP 150 meters away WHICH TAKES YOU TO THE CITY CENTER IN 15 MINUTES.
FREE BATHROOMS
WATER EMPTYING AND LOADING INCLUDED IN PRICE
ACCESS TIMES: from 9:30 am to 9:00 pm.

MONITORED 24 HOURS. COME AND ENJOY THE TRANQUILITY IN AUTOCAMPER COMPOSTELA.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa de Castela e León
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa de Castela e León
description: GALIOIL Service Station, recently opened in the Costa Vella polygon. It has Drainage of Gray Water, Black Water and water tap.

title: (15894) Teo - 9B Rúa Castiñeiro
description: Small Los Tilos shopping center, with self-service laundry, cafeteria, small supermarket, etc.

title: (15894) Teo - 26 Rúa Bidueiro
description: Urbanization with all services. Supermarket, bakery, fountain with water, swimming pool in summer with shower and toilet services, picnic tables, sports courts, playground... Located in a large park and with bus service (number 6) every 20 min. to Santiago with a stop next to the parking place...Very quiet place...

title: (15895) O Milladoiro - 2 Travesía do Porto
description: Self service laundry inside the shopping centre, near the supermarket. Good price and machines worked well.

title: (15895) Ames - 9 Rúa Agro do Medio
description: Self-service laundry.

name: Lavacolla Camper Park Santiago
title: (15820) Lavacolla Camper Park Santiago
description: We are the only area in Santiago with all the services: toilets, hot showers, electricity, gray and black water emptying, drinking water filling (free), laundry (washer and dryer), sinks, bar, dog area (pipican), picnic area, car wash. Bus to the center every 30 minutes. It is allowed to remove awnings, tables, chairs... On the Camino de Santiago.

title: (15895) O Milladoiro - Rúa Buxo
description: Paved and tarred parking, no service but drain terminal 150 m further. Perfect for a day and visit Santiago 6 km. Park rather up. Parking in the ground 100 m lower facing the modern church for one night, to see.

title: (15890) A Sionlla de Arriba -
description: Gas station with restaurant and gray and black water drainage.we spent a night here as in the pictures with no problem CCTV in use and very well lit supermarkets near by ..there are large carpark spaces in front of the restaurant not really for over night

title: (15884) Compostela - 1V Rua Formaris
description: The parking lot is on a street with little traffic. Not particularly pretty but it serves its purpose.

title: (15895) Ames - Travesía do Porto
description: Vacant land 50 m after a flat and calm marker.

name: Camping Peregrino San Marcos
title: (15820) Camping Peregrino San Marcos
description: Friendly, inexpensive campsite, clean sanitary facilities, it's rather quiet despite the proximity to the airport and the motorway. Nearby bus line that takes you to the center of Santiago in 15/20 minutes! Ideal for visiting the city. Cafeteria open in the morning, meeting point for many pilgrims.

title: (15896) Roxos - 185 Rúa de Muros
description: Self-service water

title: (15220) Aldea Nova -
description: Parking and private long-stay motorhome garage. Ideal to leave the vehicle during the Camino de Santiago, or to spend long periods of time.

title: (15886) Teo - A Xesta, 43 Calo
description: Private garden. The garden has a private saltwater pool, electrical outlet. We also have barbecue, refrigerator and refrigerator. We are 8 minutes from Santiago de Compostela and 20 minutes from the beaches. There are hiking areas and rivers for outdoor activities. Quiet and rural area. The price includes water filling and electric light load. Given the number of parking lots, please call ahead to confirm.

title: (15220) Ames - CTRA.SANTIAGO-NOIA
description: Number of places: 30 to 40. All in a service station of Los Ángeles gas group. There are all fuels, including LPG, electric charging and butane and propane cylinders. The use of the installations implies a minimum consumption of 25 euros in the facilities where the car park is located. Those who refuel with motorhome enjoy a special discount and immediate. It has a washing area with pressure machines of a height adapted to the vehicles and to the suction zone. • night Yes Maximum stay 2 nights • Water. YES • Empty gray water. YES • Drainage of wastewater. YES • Public WC. YES • Cafeterias in the same neighborhood (three meters from the car park). At 3 kilometers another station of the same group with restaurant and musical entertainment on weekends. The population of Bertamiráns at 1 kilometer. • Supermarket in the area with many references to fresh fruits and vegetables, dairy products, frozen foods and cleaning products. It also has clean product references for motorhomes (Thetford brand) • Bus 50 meters to Santiago and Noia with not every 20 minutes. Mechanical workshops at 50 meters • Beach in Noia at 30.3 km and Finisterre at 73.7 km. • WIFI If there are adapted toilets and a cloakroom for babies). Signage • Access Signals: From the highway and the road, the service station is displayed and signs appear on the road. • Signage of the area: Yes Observations For the creation of the space dedicated to campers and the specific service, we counted on the advice of the Galician Association of motor homes: to be located in a service station offers a wide range of services. Located on the road that connects Santiago de Compostela to the beaches and to Finisterra, on the Camino de Santiago.

title: (15866) O Casal - Lugar Casal
description: Nice and quiet picnic area, a few tables and a barbecue place where on the roof there is a plug where we charge mobile phones and batteries and well-kept public bathrooms

title: (15866) Teo - Autopista del Atlántico
description: Service station and restaurant, closed from 23 to 7 but with ample parking with streetlights in which there are trucks

title: (15884) Santiago de Compostela - 60 AP-9
description: Rest area of the AP9, there is enough space to park and it is rarely crowded. It has some trees and a few benches under them. It's fine for a quick stop en route.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - Rúa das Pesqueiras
description: Curious service area along the city sidewalk, but it exists and is free

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - 6 Rúa das Pesqueiras
description: Clean and reliable coin laundry, there is also to wash the dog. There are USB points to charge the mobile.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - 14 Calle Rueiro
description: Quiet free parking all day, with grassy area and river. Shops a few minutes walk.

name: Fogar de Santiso
title: (15883) Fogar de Santiso
description: Motorhome area Fofar Do Santiso.

title: (15820) Santiago de Compostela - San Paio
description: Meadow next to a pine forest on the route of the Camino de Santiago

title: (15870) Ames - Aldea Mámoa
description: Quiet place next to a church. Several places possible but we were alone. Good for one night.

title: (15866) O Faramello - 5 Lugar dua franco
description: Small parking for 3/4 caravans. There is a garden with benches and a stream. It is located next to the Pazo del Faramello. Quiet area without noise, perfect for an overnight stay.

title: (15884) - 29 Lugar Marantes
description:
Just behind the cemetery. Water and wc (might be locked) inside the cemetery.
Playground for kids. Very quiet.

title: (15865) Brión - 1 Rúa Gondar
description: Flat parking in a very quiet area behind the Carballeira de Brión. Nearby there is a fountain where you can catch water, as well as an area with picnic tables and a playground.

title: (15980) Padrón - 11 Aldea Picaraña
description: New service area in Galp service station. It is free, although it is good to refuel or spend at the station.

title: (15883) Teo, A Coruña - 72 DP-6502
description: Viewpoint of Agrela. Spectacular views from Santiago to the Arousa estuary. It is accessed from the village of Agrela. Last meters with very strong slope. there is no shadow Somewhat windy area. Shortly before arriving there is a hermitage with carballeira and benches.

title: (15883) A Agrela - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet and very clean place. Picnic tables in the shade, old washhouse. flat and accessible to any vehicle. we did not spend the night there but nice place for a break.

title: (15883) A Agrela -
description: The spot is located next to the football stadium (disused) sheltered from the wind, beautiful open view, with forest nearby. this spot avoids the big and steep climb for the next spot, which is in full wind. And often popular! For all types of templates The cops were on the Sardinian football, we saw and we said absolutely nothing.

title: (15888) Sigüeiro - 12 Rua Pablo Iglesias
description: Street parking is cut where cars do not drive and can sleep comfortably.

title: (15883) Pontevea - Rúa Ignacio Varela
description: Pernas Multicentro car park with car wash service, laundry service, gas station with supply of gas cylinders, toilets.

title: (15880) San Pedro - Unnamed Road
description: Small picnic area with a spring at an old church in the middle of the vineyards. The spring water runs slowly but that is often a good sign (well filtered). The water tastes good. While waiting for your water canisters to fill up, you can have a little picnic or look around. Very quiet and secluded.

title: (15883) Teo - 17 Estrada do Castro de Pontevea
title_short: (15883) Teo - 17 Estrada do Castro de Pontevea
description: Spot in the shade at the water's edge, just after leaving the camper van on your right, small path on the right which leads to the edge of the river.

title: (15888) - Camiño do Refuxio
description: Great place in a woody area next to a gently rushing river and very charming picknick area with tables. Very quiet, except for the occasional airplane (not disturbing to us). The spot is not completely flat.

title: (15888) - 7 Rúa Xan Castro
description: Refuge for fishing with paths that border the river tambre.

title: (15839) Negreira - 24 Calle del Puente Maceira
description: Parking, somewhat inclined, with water. I asked the townspeople and there is no problem to spend the night. 10 minutes walk from Ponte Maceiras. Just declared "Beautiful town of Spain"

name: Área Fluvial A Praíña
title: (36683) Área Fluvial A Praíña
description:
Private venue managed by the ENTREAPONTES Association. Located 13 km (9 km by highway) from Santiago de Compostela, 20 minutes by bus from the Intermodal Station. River beach within the enclosure with a beach bar and large terrace, organization of concerts... Exclusive and limited area for campers, caravans and motorhomes of 16,000 m2 out of a total of 36,000 m2. Modalities of collaboration and use of the facilities:
 Contribution of elements such as awnings, chairs, tables... together with the camper for 1 day/night of camping in collaboration with a donation to the association, as a novelty the BARBECUE area for use by Camper users and partners on request.
 Garbage collectors outside. Multiple conventional bathrooms, taps to load water, empty wastewater, laundry rooms; complementary services:
Tourist Information Office, Shop/Bakery (Bread and empanadas to order the day before, sale of coal €4 per 3kg bag)...
 Adjacent to Ponte Vea (medieval bridge), declared an Asset of Cultural Interest (BIC) The large areas of sun and shade also stand out. The enclosure is fenced with access gates. There are hiking trails on both sides of the Ulla River. Supermarket, gas station, ATM, pharmacy, bars, restaurants... 300/400 meters.

                 BASIC RULES
1 - Quiet hours from 12:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m.
2 - You cannot make fires on the ground or barbecues outside the designated area.
3 - Maintain hygiene in the enclosure: leave the waste inside its relevant containers.
4 - Respect the vegetation of the enclosure.
5 - Maintain respect for users and workers.
6 - The use of devices that can cause acoustic disturbances (speakers, instruments) is prohibited.
7 - The consumption of drugs or narcotics within the premises is prohibited.
8 - Clothes cannot be hung in unauthorized places.
9 - All the rules of the internal regulations of the A Praíña Fluvial Area must be followed.

title: (15839) A Baña - Fiopans
description: Picnic area on the edge of a small river under the oaks and eucalyptus, with toilets, water point, barbecues and tables. Access to the undergrowth with a van, but too narrow for a motorhome. Very quiet, we were alone in August. To get there, do not follow the dirt roads (there are several accesses), but go through the hamlet of Fiopans, a branch to the east takes you to the recreational area.

title: (15688) Sigüeiro - 25 Rua Penateixa
description: Flat place for an AC or two They put in some huge stones and there is no longer any possibility of parking in the meadow. Picnic tables, barbecue, all that by the river ... but it is small to maneuver several AC

title: (15821) O Pedrouzo - 9 Rúa Concello
description: Parquin in the town without services, is a parquin that would fit 2 Ac one in corner next to the park and the next square. There they do not bother but there was parking here to go to the sports center.

title: (15821) O Pedrouzo -
description: New area in O Pino Very well located and close to the Camino de Santiago. Ideal for sleeping in the middle of nature. With no noise around. It is located next to the municipal swimming pool. Therefore, you can use the pool and showers in summer from 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. for a fee. There are 2 parks right next door, one for children and one for adults. Also a walk in the middle of nature.

title: (15883) Teo -
description: AC do Xirimbao area. Overnight area of the City Council of Teo. It has 4 specific spaces for motorhomes in the middle of a large car park that allows the installation of more campers. Inoperative night lighting, picnic tables under the oak trees, 1 operational public toilet, space for emptying gray and black water and water loading. The city council is working to increase services with electrical connection points in parking spaces. It is a natural area integrated into the Natura 2000 Network. A pedestrian suspension bridge, called "Mariola", allows you to cross the River Ulla to the neighboring town hall of A Estrada. A pedestrian path, which is taken along the river, takes you to the nearby town of Pontevea, located 3 km away following that path. Bathing indicated with various signs is prohibited because it is an area of currents. The City Council of Teo appreciates that if it detects any incident in the area, notify the entity by contacting the local Development and Tourism offices (Monday to Friday from 08:00 to 15:00 or by email aedl at teo.gal) or with the police local or Civil Protection from Monday to Sunday from 08:00 to 22:00 (You can obtain the telephone numbers on the internet, since they are eliminated here).

title: (15980) Sorribas - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot in front of the church. Quiet area with beautiful walks nearby and also a  bar next door.

title: (15880) Vedra - 11 Sol
description: Parking in front of the Pazo de Santa Cruz de Rivadulla, 5 Euros to enter the Pazo. Fairly level and plenty of room, some shadows. We stop to eat and see the indicated pazo. The road has many curves, not dangerous. It is near the Pazo de Oca.

title: (15839) Ons - 13 Ons
description: laundry fountain

title: (15881) Vedra - 6 Aldea Monreal
description: Free water intake, next to gas station. Opposite between the gas station and the bar, there is a "laundry" two washing machines of 8 and 18 kg and a dryer.

title: (15881) Caldelas - AC-240
description: Viewpoint to Gundian Bridge. Picnic tables. Very quiet area.

title: (15914) Sinde -

Parking on a great river beach for swimming or taking walks in the area.
It is not illuminated.
level area.
Managed by a neighborhood association, which if there are motorhomes and campers are willing to put water services.
there is a small park for children although in low season they do not cut the grass.
picnic tables
shade
quiet river beach

title: (15911) - 36 Lugar Lamego
description: Seira river beach. Picnic tables in the shade. Reduced parking space. There is a bar. In summer can be crowded. Quiet and pleasant place. It is reached by A Escravitude on the N-550 or from the Antequeira junction, in Rois.

title: (36689) A Estrada - 16 Lugar Godoi

title: (15830) Negreira - 20 Rúa Castelao
description: Wastewater emptying service and clean filling. Dirt and level parking directly opposite. Next to emergencies and Civil Guard, very central.

title: (36685) A Estrada - Unnamed Road
description: Favorite place to spend a night or two, and enjoy the beauty of the river for this bathed, market or for fishing, no noise, full nature, barbecue on site, place flat and in the shade

title: (15830) Negreira - 11 Avenida Santiago

title_short: (15688) A Estación de Trasmonte - 2 Lugar Garga
description: Small picnic area, 5 or 6 vehicles can be parked, we have spent the night without any problem. next to a greenway, next to some houses

title: (15915) Padrón - AC-242
description: There is a gazebo overlooking the river. in the parking lot there is a table and a bench. The big trees are not there yet and there is little shade but on a day without much sun it is fine. Nearby climbing area, going down the road that leads to the river and promenade with a river beach.

title: (15910) Padrón - Aldea Agronovo
description: We had a quiet night. Place to sleep the night from Saturday to Sunday. Since on Sundays there is a market in Padron and they cut streets and it is difficult to get around and access the AC in Padron. The only downside in the morning is the noise of cars. This is the parking lot of a playground.

title: (36688) A Ribeira -
description: Quiet and separate place to spend the night in the middle of nature, or have a picnic with direct access to the river where you can bathe. if you are going to spend the night, it is better to arrive to sleep and not give many signs of life.

title: (15688) La Coruña - 3 N-550

title: (36688) Vedra - PO-213
description: Picnic area with tables and barbecues, river next to it for swimming and water activities, possibility of fishing from May 1st. Sport fishing.

title: (15823) O Pino - Unnamed Road
description: Shady place next to the river beach. Ideal for taking a bath. We have slept without problems. Some noise from a car that may pass but there is little traffic at night. No services

title: (15823) O Pino - 12 CP-0605
description: Parking area wide enough, without services, restaurants nearby, ideal for the Camino de Santiago stage.

title: (15900) Padrón - 6 Rúa Defensa do Xardín

title: (15900) Padrón - 27 Avenida de Compostela
description: Parking near the Padrón market where you can spend the night, it has no services but you have access to the whole town on foot. Right next to it is a park.

title: (15911) Rois - Iglesia de San Mamed de Rois
title_short: (15911) Rois - Iglesia de San Mamed de Rois

address.street: Iglesia de San Mamed de Rois

title: (15822) - 37 Lugar Fonte Diaz
description: Good area, quiet and with the town within walking distance.  Go to Fonte Diaz and when you see the Dona Dana party room turn right, it is a little further on from the residence or third of the place.

title: (15900) Padrón - 7 Rúa Enlace Parque
description: Laundrymat

title: (15910) Padrón - 76 Aldea Extramundi de Arriba

title_short: (15900) Padrón - 3 Rúa Porta Fondo da Vila
description: Simple city car park located 200m from a service area. Immediate proximity to the city. Many non-specific CC spaces. Convenient for going to the restaurant or shopping. Night not prohibited except market days to be verified.

title: (36685) A Estrada - 9 PO-2017
description: Parking of the pazo de oca castle

title: (15823) O Pino - 19 Lugar Brea
description: It is a gigantic parking lot away from the road and next to the Camino de Santiago. It is a gigantic parking lot with a green area also of an apparently abandoned sports field. A place without any kind of service but it seems totally quiet

title: (36587) Vila de Cruces - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place to be able to swim with very clean waters with good free parking with little influx of people it also has very shaded picnic tables, the access to the place is wide for large vans and motorhomes. There are no services, water, electricity, toilets or showers.

title: (36587) Vila de Cruces - 10 Lugar Capela
description: Nice place to bathe with children, the access until arriving with motorhomes is somewhat narrow and the parking lot has to be shared with cars as it is a place for all audiences. It has no services of any kind, only a small bar next to the parking lot. The entrance to the car park has a rather narrow curve, it is not suitable for large motorhomes of more than 6 meters.

title: (15900) Padrón - Travesía Feira
description: Area with all motorhome services and a large parking lot, no places reserved for motorhomes. 200 meters from the center of the city with all services. Villa which is the birthplace of St. James, landmarks great tradition of pilgrimage and 20 km from Santiago de Compostela and served by regular public transport. A great literary culture credited to the house-museum of Rosalia de Castro and Camilo Jose Foundation Cela.Gran. Variety of local cuisine (Padron peppers, lamprey, octopus ...)

title: (15917) Padrón - Unnamed Road
description: Rest area at the mouth of the Sar in the Ulla, ample parking for overnight, with picnic tables. Little care and a little away from the village.

title: (15282) Rois - 23 AC-543
description: Galp station on the way to Noia. Very friendly manager. We bought him a beer and he told us that there was no problem staying and even using the toilet. It closes at 10pm. Very quiet, quiet and almost perfectly flat.

title: (15822) A Coruña - Unnamed Road
description: Small area of ​​about ten places, stream next door, a dozen picnic tables with barbecue (provide a grid). There is surely a walk to do in the forest ...

title: (15689) Ordes - Estacion, 15
description: Newly created motorhome area on the outskirts with fresh water and gray and black water disposal. Site of the old railway line between La Coruña and Santiago. Possibility of hiking. There are also picnic tables and benches, a barbecue and fire pit, and a playground. Parking on grass or gravel and right on the river. Perfect for a one night stay.

title: (36681) A Estrada - 51 Lugar Figueroa de Arriba
title_short: (36681) A Estrada - 51 Lugar Figueroa de Arriba
description: Next to the municipal swimming pools of A Estrada, several places for battery parking, a 7-meter motorhome can fit without leaving the line. Flat. Nice shady pool.

title: (15981) A Igrexa - DP-3302
description: Public picnic areas with barbecue area.

title: (15688) O Cachopal - Unnamed Road
description: Area fitted out with a few tables, enough to make a fire (grills). A small river flows alongside. No service but only nature and nobody, which changes the park4night stormed in northern Spain. The debilitators left their trash and a few toilet papers lying around but otherwise very nice. Accessible for CC. A little down. Ideal for a group of 2/3 vans or CC

title: (36687) La Estrada - 9 N-640
description: Service area for emptying and filling motorhomes with water. with gas station and restaurant.

title: (36680) La Estrada - 24 Avenida Benito Vigo
description: Self-service laundry. Monday to Sunday from 9 a.m. to 10:30 p.m.

title: (36680) La Estrada - 185 Avenida Benito Vigo
description: Level parking for overnight. very close to the center of the town of A Estrada. right next door there is a place to walk dogs, an ambulatory, a Chinese shopping center and a Dia supermarket.

title: (15863) A Baña - 16 Lugar Couto Carballo
description: Motorhome area in A Baña

title: (36645) Raxoi - Unnamed Road
description: Waterfalls and hiking trail. Next to where you park there is a waterfall where you can swim. Access is rather for campers, narrow for AC. Access is two-way and it is better to try to go before nightfall, spend the night and enjoy the place the next day. Garbage container next to the car park.

title: (15821) O Pino - 3 Calle Marquiño
description: Flat place where you can make a stop, next to a working inn. I add it because there are few options on this route and it can perfectly serve to take a break.

title: (36647) Valga - 13 Lugar Carballa
description:
Ample parking with some flat places to sleep.
It has no services, but it is next to the town with a cafeteria and bakery very close.
It has a small soccer and basketball court in the same parking lot.

title: (36647) Valga - Unnamed Road
description: Top location, quiet,lovely,....and lonely,but we like. water available. bar likely closed for a wile

title: (15887) El Pino - 18 N-634
description: Large parking lot where you can also make a night stopover

title: (15680) Ordes - 26 Rúa Víctor González Faya
description: Land parking in a good location to rest if caught en route, you just deviate a few meters from the national road. Bakery, cafe and supermarket on foot in 3 minutes on the main road

title: (15684) Órdenes - Vilagudín
description: Flat surface spot for picknick or spending the night. View over the lake and dam. There is a bit run down picknick area next to the parking. We spent the night without any problem.

title: (15689) Ordes - 103 Praza do Campo Feira
description: Parking in the center of the town. No hassle problems and accessible to any bar-restaurant in the area. On Wednesdays there is a fair, so that day noo you can park from 06.00 to 16.00 Supermarkets very close Municipal swimming pool in the same parking lot, open only in July-August Walk along the river trail highly recommended

title: (15689) Ordes - 34D Rúa da Canteira
description: Quiet place to spend the night and spend the day, in front of the medical center, an area of bars and entertainment with a supermarket, right on the river promenade

title: (15982) A Coruña - AG-11
description: Free water filling

title: (15687) Lavandeira de Riba - 9 Senra
description: A flat and quiet place next to the Poulo football field, it is a vacant lot of an abandoned house on the shore from where a dirt road begins ... it is used as a stopover because it has nothing special around it ... a neighbor crossed by the late night and they were very kind, they even invited us for a walk .. they can enter with any size of camper, and they can be 3 comfortably

title: (15680) Ordes - 25 Rúa do Camposanto
description: Ground parking, good sleeping area during the holiday season, very quiet place

title: (36570) Bandeira - 8 Poblado Louras
description: Asphalted parking of the soccer field. Quiet place to stop to sleep, without traffic and with good access.

title: (36589) Silleda - Unnamed Road
description: Ample parking with many places to go to the Fervenza do Toxa. Good access from the town of Bandeira.

title: (36677) Cuntis - EP-8403
description: Area with tables to eat in the shade. Large parking area where you could sleep.

title: (15212) Roo de Abaixo -
description: We did not find anything for park4night in this area and leaving the Do Tambre suspension bridge and power plant towards Santiago de Compostela we found this perfect spot for dinner or overnight. It is more or less flat and shaded by trees. Few cars pass, they do not bother.

title: (36586) Vila de Cruces - PO-6502
description: Sleeping area and drinking water, drainage and sewage. Riverside Park across the road, restaurants and shops nearby.

title: (36612) Tarrio - 4 Vial Camino
description: Parking In Dimo. Flat and very quiet to rest. Two fountains and nearby children's park

title: (15684) O Empalme - 17 Lugar Brandoñas
description: Picnic area with barbecues and wooden picnic tables and swings. A bit neglected the swings and the grass.

title: (36612) Catoira - 2 Paseo Xelmírez
description: Parking to visit the Torres do Oeste. Next to the train track. Dead end road with shadow.

title: (36678) Pontevedra - 40 Lugar Barrio Castrolandin
description: Castro de Castrolandín, a beautiful place surrounded by nature, our camper is great and we arrived without difficulty at the entrance. Esplanade to park and walk to the fort. Highly recommended to stop. No service, just nature and fantastic views

title: (36546) Carboeiro de Francia - Unnamed Road
description: Small monastery car park, surrounded by nature in a remote place, very wild, not suitable for large motorhomes, only campervans and / or small motorhomes.

title: (36612) Catoira - 2A Paseo Xelmírez
description: Esplanade next to a river beach and picnic tables.

title: (15686) Frades - CONCELLO DE FRADES
description: A small, very quiet picnic area by the side of a river. Very good for a night between Santiago de Compostela and Asturias. Attention very difficult access for motorhome because steep slopes and narrow passages. Rather place for vans.

title: (36612) Catoira - 4A Paseo Xelmírez
description:
A peaceful corner to spend the night but also the day in love or in family. If you have a dog he will be happiest with all the room there is at the water's edge.
Flat land, nearby picnic tables, playground, outdoor showers, breathtaking view of the river and the viaduct. There is even a huge open-air swimming pool accessible from 1 p.m. to 7 p.m. for only €2 (WC available only at the pool). Accessible by car, van and even motorhome! To stay there to sleep there is also no room for 10 cars, it will be better to go to the spot 200m before.

title: (36612) Catoira - 7 Rúa da Estación
description: Perfect for launching a machine while doing 3 runs right next to it.

title: (15819) Portodemouros -
description: Parking opposite the Living Museum of Honey. It is a large esplanade, quite flat and without services. Very quiet to spend the night. There are rubbish bins and a water connection that we don't use, but maybe for an emergency, it could be used.

title: (15214) Lousame - 19 AC-308
description: Route of the Paper Mills: Beginning of the route with a recreational area with tables and stone benches, areas for grilling. Very shady with many trees. It has a source of drinking water and a river. The route starts from here. Little parking area shortly before arriving.

title: (15819) Portodemouros -
description: Large flat area amongst the trees. No view but away from the road. Should be okay for an overnight if you're not disturbed by local quarry noise that might continue until late.

title: (15819) Portodemouros -
description: Small esplanade on the edge of the reservoir; very quiet to spend the night. No services.

title: (36659) Caldas de Reyes - 94 N-550
description: There are two low cost CRP gas stations with the cheapest fuel in many km, it also has a Merca express supermarket, it has a black and gray emptying area, it also has a washing area for AC and CAMPER, I thought I saw that they also have a parking area .Only with making a minimum expense at the gas station or supermarket, they did not charge us for emptying and filling, there is a hotel restaurant right in front of us. They treated us very kindly, I suppose something will have to do with the owner having a CAMPER.

title: (15185) Cerceda - 26 Lugar Estacion Queixas
description: It is one of the stations on the greenway, it is good to know which ones are on the entire greenway in case you have to go pick up a straggler.

title: (36684) La Estrada - 2 PO-7026
description: Very quiet place between a estrada and cuntis. perfect parking for sleeping. level ground. no service. next to a beautiful church.

title: (36612) Catoira - 22 Lugar tras Da Veiga
description: Historic windmills parking. Place with panoramic views. It is very quiet and alone.

title: (36612) As Rañas - 15 Camiño As Rañas
description: Hermitage of San Cibrán. There are picnic tables and several more or less flat places to park. 100 meters down a track at the bottom there is a wide and flat esplanade with picnic tables as well. It can perfectly pass an 8m motorhome.

title: (36612) Catoira - 21 Avenida Muiños de Vento
description: Next to a disused quarry that is now a beautiful lake for swimming and for the animals to enjoy. There are two accesses to the place, the first one that you find is bad for going up with the AC and the second a little further on with which you get to the site well. quiet area with the possibility of bathing and walks. our motorhome is 7m and it arrived without problem. !!!!!!!There are two paths through which you can climb. one steep and full of potholes and another that is feasible to go with a large motorhome, see well on Google Maps or go down and look for the road before taking the first one you see !!!!!!

title: (15819) Tronceda a Nova -
description: Quiet place to spend the night on the shore of the reservoir, possibility of swimming. Access by a narrow road with a lot of trees, it is perfect for a van

title: (36612) Catoira - 16 Avenida Muiños de Vento
description: Beautiful site on the outskirts of Catoira. We slept on a Friday night and no problem. When you get to the lake, there is a path where you go up the hill, we went with a 4x4 but I think it can be accessed with any vehicle!

title: (15841) Santa Comba - Cusaduira
description: Recreational area next to river beach. Barbecues, tables, plenty of shade and bathrooms.

title: (36599) Arxe - 4 Lugar Arxe
description: Nice spot. We had a picnic there. However, it seems easy to spend the night there without disturbance, and without disturbing anyone. Small play area for children. Only problem, the water point does not work.

title: (36599) Arzúa - 1 Lugar Arxe
description:
Beautiful silent place next to the lake. You can meet only few fishermen there. 
Nice view to the lake. Possibility to swim.

title: (36675) - 28 Rua San Ildefonso
description: Large parking in the shade with a lot of table to make a good little pose with a bar in front and a water point

title: (15200) Noia - 25 AC-311
description: Here you can buy Repsol bottles without formalities. 28 euros complete price 10.2022

title: (15210) Noia - 13 Aldea Carracido
description: EROSKI gas station. Clean water

title: (15685) Frades - Unnamed Road
description: Frades municipal swimming pool. Pleasant level location with picnic area. free public summer pool with reservations due to covid.

title: (15287) Serra de Outes - 7 Rua Vistaalegre
description: Very nice and quiet place, where a path next to the river goes down, allowing you to follow the path of the lamprey. There are restaurants 250 meters and a bakery 400. Possibility to swim in the river. Source with drinking water. We spent the night without problem. Many friends of neighbors.
